definitions.definition: make (something needed or wanted) available to someone; provide.
examples: the farm supplies apples to cider makers
synonyms: shell out "they supplied money to rebels"provide
arm "the lake supplies the city with water"

definitions.definition: provide (someone) with something needed or wanted.
examples: they struggled to supply the besieged island with aircraft
synonyms: shell out "they supplied money to rebels"provide
arm "the lake supplies the city with water"

definitions.definition: be adequate to satisfy (a requirement or demand).
examples: the two reservoirs supply about 1% of the city's needs
synonyms: cater for "windmills supply their power needs"

definitions.definition: take over (a place or role left by someone else).
examples: when she died, no one could supply her place
